mapper.select: select id, todo, createdDate, todo_set, imageSrc, ( select count(id) from todo where id != 'null') as total, ( select count(todo_set) from todo where todo_set = 1 ) as todoTotal from contentdata.todo order by id DESC LIMIT 0,10;
select id, todo, createdDate, todo_set, DATEDIFF(now(),todos.createdDate) dates from todo todos where todo_set = 1 order by createdDate DESC;
mapper.insert: -- 여기서 TRIM 은 문자열의 양쪽 공백을 없애줌 내부 공백은 아님 Insert into todo(todo,todo_set,imageSrc) values(TRIM(#{todo}),TRIM(#{todo_set}),TRIM(#{imageSrc}))
mapper.select: select todo.id, todo.todo, todo.createdDate, todo.imageSrc, todo.todo_set, DATEDIFF(now(),todo.createdDate) dates from todo todo where id = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE todo set todo_set = false where id = #{id};
